articles.title: Host Whoopi Goldberg suspended by American TV network for Holocaust comments - The Star Online
articles.description: Despite an apology from the host of 'The View' talk show, ABC News President Kim Godwin said she had decided it was not enough.
articles.content:
US actress Whoopi Goldberg on Tuesday (Feb 1) was suspended from the American talk show she hosts for two weeks after saying that the Nazi genocide of six million Jews "was not about race".
